details:
[CVE-2016-10728](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2016-10728)
 If an ICMPv4 error packet is received as the first packet on a flow
 in the to\_client direction, it can lead to missed TCP/UDP detection
 in packets arriving afterwards.


For Debian 8 Jessie, this problem has been fixed in version
2.0.7-2+deb8u1.


We recommend that you upgrade your suricata packages.


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
